name: Global Adventures
description: Global Adventures is an MMORPG for Windows PCs. As a newly recruited agent for the Treasure Hunters Association, you must travel the world conquering dungeons, digging up treasure, and taking down bosses with your friends!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel/AMD Dual Core 2.4g (Ghz) Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GT 630 / ATI HD6570 / InterHD5200 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel/AMD Quad Core 2.8g (Ghz) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 / ATI HD7750 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space
